ygData.subject: Re: Some questions about Experience (off-topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is more in line with what I ve observed.  Who does the most damage in group (would get the kill if not grouped) seems to be a factor in whether or not
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 27 Oct 1999, Christine wrote:
>
> I agree with Thormeal here - I have a level 33 ranger that has been grouped
> with a level 9 paladin for a few days (doing a quest) and I will say that if
> I kill something green to me, he will not get exp if we are grouped.
>
> The confusion comes because if HE kills something, and I assist in no way in
> the fight (I assume bard songs would be considered assisting, but I did this
> with my ranger so can't say for sure) he will get the exp he normally would,
> even if we are grouped.

This is more in line with what I've observed. Who does the
most damage in group (would get the kill if not grouped) seems
to be a factor in whether or not someone too low level gets
experience.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
